summary:
This mod is quite simple, but it adds a great immersion to your gameplay.
It removes the music soundtracks in all Helgen cells, including some surrounding cells and adds wind loops. The effect is a very dramatic scene and fear around the village of Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://s7.postimg.org/m2x0txwln/title.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=yellow]* OVERVIEW *[/color]
This mod is quite simple, but it adds a great immersion to your gameplay.
It removes the music soundtracks in all Helgen cells, including some surrounding cells and adds wind loops. The effect is a very dramatic scene and fear around the village of Helgen.

[color=yellow]* HOW IT WORKS *[/color]
You have just to come back to Helgen and feel the desolation of an abandoned and destroyed village by Alduin.
Also you can feel how it is violent and dangerous after defeating the local bandits.

[color=yellow]* HOW TO INSTALL *[/color]
Unpack and enable the ESP via menu launcher

[color=yellow]* HOW TO UNINSTALL *[/color]
- Be in another place like Riverwood.
- Save
- Uninstall the mod
- Reload and play again.

[color=yellow]* COMPATIBILITY *[/color]
The mod should be compatible with any other mod.
My best reccomendation is to place my mod at the first position in loading order.

[color=yellow]* JOIN ME ON FACEBOOK *[/color]
https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

ENJOY!
author: MannyGT
